definition: bitter melon (bitter gourd, balsam pear, balsam apple, leprosy gourd, bitter cucumber)

sentences.english: Add balsam pear, saute with medium heat until done, serve.
sentences.chinese: 最後加入苦瓜，以中火再炒拌至所有材料熟透即可。

sentences.english: The summer season to endure hardship, balsam pear is undoubtedly good choice of vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 夏季要喫苦，當季蔬菜苦瓜無疑是好選擇。

sentences.english: The researchers note that there may be as many as 70 active compounds in bitter melon.
sentences.chinese: 研究者表示苦瓜中至少含有70種活性物質。

sentences.english: We are two bitter gourds on the same vine.
sentences.chinese: 咱們倆是一根藤上的苦瓜。

sentences.english: Isolation method of plant insulin from Momordica charantia was improved and its hypoglycemic function was probed.
sentences.chinese: 改進苦瓜植物胰島素的分離方法並探討其降糖功能。

sentences.english: We are two bitter gourds on the same vine -- we both suffered the same hard lot (in the old society.)
sentences.chinese: 我們倆是一根藤上的苦瓜。

sentences.english: It suggested that momordica charantia had certain immumoenhancemental effects.
sentences.chinese: 提示苦瓜具有一定的免疫增強作用。

sentences.english: Chinese team just get out of parade from now on, never join it again.
sentences.chinese: 中國人的隊伍臉上沒有任何表情，苦瓜臉。

sentences.english: They went out into the open country and sat down, and the two pulled sorrowful faces.
sentences.chinese: 他們來到外面的開闊地坐下，那兩個耷拉着苦瓜臉。

sentences.english: I could eat almost anything. The only thing I didn't really enjoy was bitter- melon .
sentences.chinese: 我幾乎什麼都能喫，我唯一不喜歡的東西就是苦瓜。

sentences.english: The molecular evolution of ribosome-inactivating protein gene family in Momordica charantia L.
sentences.chinese: 探討苦瓜核糖體失活蛋白基因家族分子演化之研究。

sentences.english: Study on column extraction technique of saponins from Momordica charantia L.
sentences.chinese: 苦瓜皁甙柱提取工藝的研究。

sentences.english: You thought I'd be my usual blubbery mess of snot and tears, didn't you?
sentences.chinese: 你以爲我會帶着那副苦瓜臉一把鼻涕一把眼淚而來？

sentences.english: Due to some bitterness eat food, such as bitter gourd .
sentences.chinese: 要適當多喫一些苦味的食物，如苦瓜等。

sentences.english: Results Saponins in 80 % ethanol elution was the highest and over %.
sentences.chinese: 結果80%乙醇洗液中苦瓜總皁苷的含量最高%。

sentences.english: People who eat bitter gourd in long-term can get over acne.
sentences.chinese: 長期喫用苦瓜的人能夠擺脫青春痘的問題。

definition: eggplant (Solanum melongena L.)/aubergine/brinjal/Guinea squash/phonetic "cheese" (when being photographed)/equivalent of "say cheese"
wax gourd (Cucurbitaceae, Benincasa hispida)/white gourd/white hairy melon/Chinese squash
Chinese water chestnut/Eleocharis dulcis or E. congesta
radish (Raphanus sativus), esp. white radish 白蘿蔔|白萝卜[bai2 luo2 bo5]/CL:條|条[tiao2]
Chinese broccoli/Chinese kale/cabbage mustard/Brassica oleracea var. alboglabra/also pr. [jie4 lan2]
